data.title: The Corporation Handbook: Overview
data.meta_description: Discover the comprehensive guide to corporations with our 2024 Corporation Handbook. Learn about corporate structures, compliance, finance, and more.
data.text:
Whether they have one shareholder or millions, corporations are business entities created under state law. As “creatures of statute,” they are governed by state corporation laws and have unique corporate features.

In this handbook, you’ll find an overview of corporation-related topics, plus explanations of terms and concepts commonly used in the corporate area. It examines, among other topics, the overall corporate structure, how corporations maintain good standing with state offices, how to comply with the Corporate Transparency Act, how corporations are taxed, and how they raise capital. You’ll also find a glossary of corporate terms for handy reference. Armed with this information, you’ll be better prepared to make decisions regarding your growing business.
